conclusion: Analyze forces to calculate the ratio between rope tension and force exerted by pillow on child
Guide rail inclined at angle α, ball slides without friction, rope at angle β, pillow mass m₁, child mass m₂
Total mass of pillow-child system is (m₁ + m₂), gravitational force is (m₁ + m₂)g
Gravitational force components: (m₁ + m₂)g sin α (parallel), (m₁ + m₂)g cos α (perpendicular)
Tension in rope F₁ balances gravity component causing slide: F₁ = (m₁ + m₂)g sin α
Force exerted by pillow on child is contact force, related to normal force
Pillow transfers tension force to child, force exerted equals tension in rope
Ratio of tension to force exerted by pillow is 1:1
Final answer: Ratio of tension of rope to force exerted by pillow on child is 1:1
